mapper.select: SELECT bai.id, bai.attr_name, bai.category_id, bai.category_level, bav.id attr_value_id, bav.value_name as attr_value, bav.attr_id FROM base_attr_info bai INNER JOIN base_attr_value bav ON bai.id = bav.attr_id INNER JOIN sku_attr_value sav ON sav.value_id = bav.id WHERE sav.sku_id = #{skuId}
